Review_title: The director of this movie is a scammer and a liar
Review_Text: About 10 years ago, the director of this movie tricked several girls from her alma mater to took footages from their daily lives so as to make a documentary either for internal viewing or limited viewing, such as released as DVD for alumni only. Now, this director releases the movie in cinema without some of the girl's consent for financial purpose.Furthermore, this director once pretended to be a sport news reporter and conducted an interview with a Hong Kong famous athlete, Sarah Lee Wai Sze right after her cycling race, then this director used this interview footage in this movie without that athlete's consent for financial gain as well. That athlete called on her fans to boycott this movie.I would not recommend this movie to any moral person.
